name: places/ChIJV3_IVIlZwokRRf9IdNxxvsw
formattedAddress: 81 Mercer St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 81 Mercer St, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: I had pre-booked parking from 11:30am-7pm. I arrived on time and the attendant yelled at me saying the lot was full. I tried to explain that I had a reservation. He yelled at me again and went inside the booth and slammed the door. They aren't refunding me. This is the most unpaid and unprotected parking establishment that I have dealt with.

text.text: I had pre-booked parking from 11:30am-7pm. I arrived on time and the attendant yelled at me saying the lot was full. I tried to explain that I had a reservation. He yelled at me again and went inside the booth and slammed the door. They aren't refunding me. This is the most unpaid and unprotected parking establishment that I have dealt with.

originalText.text: We parked at this place for 41 min. Price said $26 for the first hour. The guy never said anything about having to pay cash or the extra $ for a small SUV. Got back there and he claimed the credit card machine didn’t work (he didn’t even try) and forced us to pay $41 in cash to get the car back. Con artist. If I hadn’t been already late for the airport, I would have called a cop. DON’T PARK HERE.  They make up the rules as they go and hold your car hostage til you give him what he wants

originalText.text: CAUTION! FRAUD! THEY WILL FORCE YOU TO PARK OVERNIGHT  AND CHARGE YOU 3 TIMES THE PARKING FEE! I parked at Park Mercer in the morning this week. I told them I will come back to pick up the car at 7:00 pm, they said they open 24 hours so no worries. BUT when I came back at 7:15 pm, they entire parking lot was closed!! No one is there and no one answers the phone!! I came back the second day, they won't give me my car unless I pay overnight fee plus two days parking fee,  total of $113. DO NOT TRUST ANY WORD COME OUT OF THEIR MOUTH!

originalText.text: Do. Not. Park. Here. Wish I saw these reviews before I Booked & paid in advance. Showed up on time and he said it was full and walked away on us. Would not listen. The guy who is pictured in the other review was the same guy for us. Horrible. Do. Not. Park. Here.

originalText.text: Another lot that advertises an "Early Bird Special", but charges you whatever they want. Expext to pay $54+ at anytime.  They rob you.
